user.title: New Horticulture Assistant entry
user.description: Choose how you want to get started. You can create your first plant profile now or skip and add one later from the profile manager.

post_setup.title: New entry for Horticulture Assistant
post_setup.description: This integration is already set up. Create another plant profile or open the profile manager from the entry options.

data.next_action: What would you like to do?

profile.title: Create plant profile
profile.description: Name your plant and choose how you want to organise its data. We'll generate a safe identifier from the name so entity IDs stay unique.

data_description.plant_name: Used to build the profile identifier and entity IDs. Stick to letters, numbers, and spaces for best results.
data_description.plant_type: Optional label shown in dashboards. We will slugify it automatically when syncing files.
data_description.profile_scope: Helps organise automations by describing whether this profile is for a single plant, a batch, or a zone.

threshold_source.title: How should we set targets?
threshold_source.description: Choose how you want to populate thresholds for this profile.

thresholds.title: Set manual targets
thresholds.description: Enter minimum and maximum values for each metric. Leave any field blank to keep the inherited default. Minimums must stay below their matching maximums. Each field lists the supported range.

data_description.temperature_min: Lowest acceptable temperature before alerts trigger (-20 to 60 °C).
data_description.temperature_max: Highest safe temperature before alerts trigger (-20 to 60 °C).
data_description.humidity_min: Minimum relative humidity for the plant (0 to 100%).
data_description.humidity_max: Maximum relative humidity before mould risks (0 to 100%).
data_description.illuminance_max: Maximum light level before shading is required (0 to 250000 lx).
data_description.conductivity_min: Lowest electrical conductivity (fertility) target (0 to 20000 µS/cm).
data_description.conductivity_max: Highest electrical conductivity target before dilution (0 to 20000 µS/cm).

threshold_copy.title: Copy profile targets
threshold_copy.description:
Select an existing profile or library template to copy thresholds, sensors, and metadata from. Use the filter field to narrow long lists, or apply keywords such as `source:library` or `scope:individual` to focus results.
{filter_summary}

data_description.filter: Search by name, or add `source:`/`scope:` qualifiers to zero in on templates.
data_description.profile_id: The profile whose thresholds and sensor wiring you want to clone.

sensors.title: Link sensors
sensors.description:
Pick sensors from the suggestions below or enter any entity ID.
{sensor_hints}

data_description.moisture_sensor: Entity reporting soil moisture or volumetric water content.
data_description.temperature_sensor: Ambient or canopy temperature sensor for the plant.
data_description.ec_sensor: Electrical conductivity or nutrient strength sensor.
data_description.co2_sensor: Carbon dioxide concentration sensor near the plant.

error.threshold_field_error: Adjust this value to stay within the supported range.
error.no_template_matches: No templates match your filter. Clear the filter or try another search.

abort.post_setup_use_options: Use Configure → Options → Add profile on the Horticulture Assistant entry to manage profiles.
abort.profile_added: Created a new profile: {profile}. You can edit it from the profile manager.
abort.cannot_delete_primary: The primary profile cannot be deleted.
abort.unknown_profile: The selected profile could not be found.

basic.title: General settings
basic.description: Sensor dropdowns are pre-populated with likely matches, but you can still choose any entity ID.

data.keep_stale: Keep derived values when sensors are stale
data.opb_enable_upload: Allow contributing data back to OpenPlantbook

add_profile.title: Add profile

data_description.name: Displayed in the UI and converted into a filesystem-safe identifier.
data_description.profile_scope: Decides whether thresholds apply to a single plant, a batch, or an entire zone.
data_description.copy_from: Start with an existing profile's settings instead of a blank slate.
data_description.species_id: Load defaults from one of the bundled species reference profiles.
data_description.cultivar_id: Refine defaults by inheriting from a cultivar-specific blueprint.

manage_profiles.title: Manage profiles
manage_profiles.description: Choose a profile to edit or remove.

manage_profile_general.title: Edit profile details
manage_profile_general.description: Update the profile name, scope, or species metadata for {profile}.

data_description.name: Visible label and base for the internal identifier.
data_description.plant_type: Optional species or cultivar label shown on dashboards.
data_description.profile_scope: Controls how automations interpret this profile (individual plant, batch, or zone).
data_description.species_display: Friendly display name stored with the profile metadata.

data_description.illuminance: Lux or light-level measurement for the grow area.
data_description.moisture: Substrate moisture or water content sensor.
data_description.co2: Carbon dioxide sensor for the growing environment.

data_description.temperature_min: Lowest temperature before alerts trigger (-20 to 60 °C).
data_description.temperature_max: Highest temperature before alerts trigger (-20 to 60 °C).
data_description.illuminance_min: Minimum light level the plant should receive (0 to 250000 lx).
data_description.illuminance_max: Maximum comfortable light level before shading is required (0 to 250000 lx).
data_description.conductivity_min: Lowest acceptable nutrient strength (0 to 20000 µS/cm).
data_description.conductivity_max: Upper limit for nutrient strength (0 to 20000 µS/cm).

manage_profile_delete.title: Delete profile
manage_profile_delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {profile}? This cannot be undone.

attach_sensors.title: Attach sensors
attach_sensors.description:
Link sensors for {profile} so automations and analytics receive live data. You can skip now and we'll remind you to link them later.
{conflict_warning}{sensor_hints}

data_description.temperature: Pick the entity that measures air or canopy temperature.
data_description.humidity: Choose a relative humidity entity near this plant.
data_description.illuminance: Lux or light sensor that tracks the grow area.
data_description.moisture: Moisture, VWC, or substrate probe entity for the plant.
data_description.skip_linking: Finish onboarding without wiring sensors. We'll create a reminder.

configure_ai.title: Configure AI
configure_ai.description: Set API and model parameters for the assistant.

nutrient_schedule.title: Select profile
nutrient_schedule.description: Choose which profile's nutrient schedule to edit.

nutrient_schedule_edit.title: Edit nutrient schedule
nutrient_schedule_edit.description:
Update the nutrient schedule for {profile}. Current stages: {current_count}. Auto-generate using plant type {plant_type}. Example:
{example}

error.generation_failed: Automatic schedule generation failed. Check the logs for details.
error.invalid_json: Enter valid JSON for the nutrient schedule.
error.invalid_format: Provide a JSON list of schedule entries.
error.invalid_row: One or more schedule entries are missing required fields.
error.threshold_field_error: Adjust this value to stay within the supported range.
error.invalid_profile_id: Use letters, numbers, or underscores for the profile name.
error.profile_id_too_long: Profile ID must be 32 characters or fewer.
error.duplicate_profile_id: A profile with this identifier already exists. Choose a different name.
error.unknown_species: Select a species from the list.
error.unknown_cultivar: Pick a cultivar from the known templates or leave the field blank.
error.cultivar_requires_species: Select a species to pair with this cultivar.
error.cultivar_mismatch: Choose a cultivar that belongs to the selected species.

missing_lineage_species.title: Profile missing species reference
missing_lineage_species.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) points to species {species_id}, but that species profile was not found. Update the profile to use a valid species or create the missing species profile.

missing_lineage_parent.title: Profile missing parent reference
missing_lineage_parent.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) lists {parent_id} as a parent profile, but it could not be loaded. Remove the invalid parent reference or create the missing profile to restore inheritance.

missing_profile_sensor.title: Profile sensor entity missing
missing_profile_sensor.description: {profile_name} ({profile_id}) references {entity_id}, but that entity could not be found. Update the sensor mapping or restore the entity, then reload Horticulture Assistant.

onboarding_stage_failure.title: Setup step failed
onboarding_stage_failure.description: The {stage} step failed while setting up Horticulture Assistant: {error}. Check the logs, fix the issue, then reload the integration.
